00029 namespace com { namespace xuggle { namespace xuggler
00030 {
00031 
00032   class AudioSamples : public IAudioSamples
00033   {
00034     VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_OBJECT_PRIVATE_MAKE(AudioSamples)
00035   public:
00036     // IMediaData
00037     virtual int64_t getTimeStamp() { return getPts(); }
00038     virtual void setTimeStamp(int64_t aTimeStamp) { setPts(aTimeStamp); }
00039     virtual IRational* getTimeBase() { return mTimeBase.get(); }
00040     virtual void setTimeBase(IRational *aBase) { mTimeBase.reset(aBase, true); }
00041     virtual int32_t getSize() { return getNumSamples()*getSampleSize(); }
00042     virtual bool isKey() { return true; }
00043 
00044     // IAudioSamples
00045     virtual bool isComplete();
00046     virtual int32_t getSampleRate();
00047     virtual int32_t getChannels();
00048     virtual Format getFormat();
00049     virtual uint32_t getSampleBitDepth();
00050 
00051     virtual uint32_t getNumSamples();
00052     virtual uint32_t getMaxBufferSize();
00053     virtual uint32_t getSampleSize();
00054     virtual uint32_t getMaxSamples();
00055     virtual com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer* getData();
00056     virtual int64_t getPts();
00057     virtual void setPts(int64_t aValue);
00058     virtual int64_t getNextPts();
00059     virtual int32_t setSample(uint32_t sampleIndex, int32_t channel, Format format, int32_t sample);
00060     virtual int32_t getSample(uint32_t sampleIndex, int32_t channel, Format format);
00061     virtual void setData(com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer* buffer);
00062     virtual void setComplete(bool complete, uint32_t numSamples,
00063         int32_t sampleRate, int32_t channels, Format sampleFmt,
00064         int64_t pts);
00065 
00066 
00067     /*
00068      * Convenience method that from C++ returns the buffer
00069      * managed by getData() above.
00070      *
00071      * @param startingSample The sample to start the array at.
00072      *   That means that only getNumSamples()-startingSample
00073      *   samples are available in this AudioSamples collection.
00074      */
00075     virtual short *getRawSamples(uint32_t startingSample);
00076     
00080     virtual int32_t ensureCapacity(int32_t capacityInBytes);
00081     
00082     /*
00083      * This creates an audio sample.
00084      */
00085     static AudioSamples* make(uint32_t numSamples,
00086         uint32_t numChannels);
00087     static AudioSamples* make(uint32_t numSamples,
00088         uint32_t numChannels, IAudioSamples::Format);
00089     
00090     static AudioSamples* make(com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer* buffer, int channels,
00091         IAudioSamples::Format format);
00092   protected:
00093     AudioSamples();
00094     virtual ~AudioSamples();
00095   private:
00096     void allocInternalSamples();
00097     static void setBufferType(IAudioSamples::Format format,
00098         com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer * buffer);
00099     com::xuggle::ferry::RefPointer<com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer> mSamples;
00100     com::xuggle::ferry::RefPointer<IRational> mTimeBase;
00101     uint32_t mNumSamples;
